Name: Don't Touch Lava
About the game: Don't Touch Lava is a 2D platformer/runner against backgrounds of castle, caves and cliffs. Jump over pits and baddies, collect power-up charges to augment your jump ability, collect coins to boost your points, and see how high your score can go! Keep running as long as you can; don't touch enemies and don't touch lava!
